Event.Message: Error Instrument: ProcessName: %1 WindowTitle: %2 MsgCaption: %3 MsgText: %4 CallerModuleName: %5 BaseAddr: %6 ImageSize: %7 ReturnAddr: %8
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WindowTitle" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="MsgCaption" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="MsgText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CallerModuleName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BaseAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ImageSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ReturnAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="__binLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="binary" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="__binLength"/> </template>
